Hero.title: Rooms with soul
Hero.subtitle: Relax close to nature — forest, beach and tranquility in the heart of Pomerania

mobile.seeDoHighlight: Discover authentic attractions of the Kashubia and Pomerania region – mushroom picking, kayaking, bonfires and much more.

DziewannaIntro.headline: Dziewanna – rooms with soul in the heart of Pomerania
DziewannaIntro.description1: It’s a place where nature meets home warmth. In the very heart of Kashubia, near Słupsk and Ustka, we have created a space full of peace, greenery and genuine hospitality.
DziewannaIntro.description2: We offer six cozy mini-apartments with private bathrooms and kitchenettes – ideal for families, couples and solo travelers. Each has its own unique atmosphere and a view of the garden, forest or communal space.
DziewannaIntro.description3: Guests have access to a lounge with a fireplace, a kitchen with a large table, a cozy balcony and a green garden with sun loungers and a swimming pool. These are places where conversations, laughter and memories are born.
DziewannaIntro.description4: Our farm is not only accommodation, it is also contact with nature: goats, dogs, cats, forests full of mushrooms, cycling paths, and nearby – the famous dunes in the Słowiński National Park.
DziewannaIntro.description5: Dziewanna is a space for those who seek silence, balance and authentic rest. Close to nature, away from the rush, in the heart of Pomerania.

SeasonalCard.title: Dziewanna recommends today
SeasonalCard.item1: Infusion of mint and nettle from our garden
SeasonalCard.item3: A walk in the forest and picking herbs
SeasonalCard.item4: A bike trip to Lake Krzynia
SeasonalCard.item6: Dinner in the garden with a barbecue or bonfire

AccommodationBox.title: Accommodation
AccommodationBox.description: Stay in one of 6 cozy studio apartments with a private kitchen and bathroom. Surrounded by nature, garden, animals and a seasonal pool — ideal for couples and families.

SeeAndDoBox.title: What to do in the area
SeeAndDoBox.description: Discover cycling trails, forest paths, mushroom picking, kayaking on Lake Krzynia, goat cheese tasting, bonfires and more attractions around Dziewanna.

spring.title: Spring in Dziewanna
spring.description: Spring in Pomerania is a time when nature awakens. At Dziewanna you can watch the forests come to life, listen to birds singing and enjoy the first warm days. It's the perfect time for bike trips around Kashubia and walks through the surrounding meadows.

summer.title: Summer in Dziewanna
summer.description: The summer months are a time full of sun, swimming in the garden pool and evening bonfires under the stars. Dziewanna is the perfect place for a holiday close to nature – far from the hustle and bustle, yet close to the sea, Ustka and Słowiński National Park.

autumn.title: Autumn in Dziewanna
autumn.description: Autumn in Kashubia delights with colors and the scent of the forest. It's the season of mushroom picking, walks through golden leaves and evenings by the fireplace. At Dziewanna you will feel true peace and the magic of this unique time of year.

winter.title: Winter in Dziewanna
winter.description: Winter in Dziewanna is silence, snow and coziness. The perfect time to rest by the fire, enjoy hot herbal tea from our garden and have long conversations in the atmospheric communal kitchen. Or maybe a sleigh ride or a walk through the winter forest?

aboutDziewanna.title: About Dziewanna
aboutDziewanna.description: Dziewanna is more than just accommodation. It’s a place where time stops and everyday life stays outside the garden gate. Immerse yourself in the peace of Kashubian nature, surrounded by birdsong, the scent of herbs and sunlight filtering through the leaves. Our apartments are a haven created with heart – for families, couples, solo travelers and cyclists. Far from crowds, close to the forest, bonfires and good conversations. Dziewanna is a home with soul – feel invited.
aboutDziewanna.paragraph1: In the heart of Kashubian nature, among forests, meadows and silence, lies Dziewanna – a place that delights in every season.
aboutDziewanna.paragraph2: Created with passion by Izabela Gordonowicz and Tomasz Tisler, Dziewanna is more than just a place to stay. It’s a space where everyone will find peace and their own rhythm.
aboutDziewanna.spring: In spring everything awakens to life, and the garden fills with greenery.
aboutDziewanna.summer: In summer it smells of herbs, bonfires and laughter in the garden.
aboutDziewanna.autumn: In autumn nature glistens with gold and fruits ripen in the orchard.
aboutDziewanna.winter: In winter everything is covered by white fluff – the perfect time to rest by the fireplace.
aboutDziewanna.gardenWalk: walk through the ecological garden and discover wild herbs;
aboutDziewanna.fruitTasting: pick and taste fresh seasonal fruits straight from the bushes;
aboutDziewanna.bonfire: prepare wood for a summer bonfire under the stars;
aboutDziewanna.homemadeProducts: spend time with the hosts, tasting liqueurs and cheeses from goat’s milk.
aboutDziewanna.paragraph3: Dziewanna is a place where people live in harmony with nature. Where each season has its own rhythm and story to tell.
aboutDziewanna.invite: We invite you to Dziewanna – rooms with soul.

accommodation.title: Our accommodation
accommodation.intro: At Dziewanna we offer accommodation with soul – each apartment combines comfort and contact with nature.

apartments.sampleDescription: Cozy apartment with a view of the forest and access to the garden.

notFound.message: Oops! Such a page doesn't exist or has been moved.

heroNoclegi.title: Dziewanna – accommodation with soul that stays in the heart
heroNoclegi.description: Stay in cozy apartments with your own kitchen and heating. In the evening, join the bonfire in the garden or a shared barbecue with other guests. In the lounge with a fireplace, conversations, laughter and peace await. Dziewanna is not just accommodation – it's a place that brings people and nature together.

facilities.view: View of the garden and nature

lawenda.title: Lavender
lawenda.description: Romantic apartment with a view of the garden, ideal for couples seeking peace and nature. A private kitchen, bathroom and the scent of lavender outside the window create the perfect atmosphere for a holiday near the sea.

chaber.title: Cornflower
chaber.description: A cozy interior with blue accents, inspired by cornflowers from the surrounding meadows. A great choice for solo travelers or couples. Kitchen, bathroom and a view of nature included.

dziewanna.title: Dziewanna
dziewanna.description: Our flagship room — spacious, bright and full of soul. A private kitchen, comfortable bathroom and windows overlooking the green garden make it hard to leave.

mak.title: Poppy
mak.description: A warm and sunny apartment with red details, inspired by poppies from Kashubian fields. Ideal for a summer holiday for a couple or a family with a child. Silence, bird songs and closeness to nature.

malwa.title: Hollyhock
malwa.description: Family apartment with access to the garden, a large kitchen and a private bathroom. Inspirations of nature and Kashubian hollyhock in the details. A comfortable stay close to the beaches and Słowiński National Park.

roza.title: Rose
roza.description: Delicate, feminine apartment for those seeking elegance and peace. Ideal for a weekend for two or a romantic escape from the city. A balcony, kitchen and cozy interior await.

niezapominajka.title: Forget-me-not
niezapominajka.description: Room with a view of the forest and access to the green garden. The name obliges — you cannot forget this place. A great base for mushroom picking, cycling and walking around Kashubia.

reviews.sectionSubtitle: Real reviews from our visitors, we’ve been thanked for our hospitality {count}+ times
reviews.value: Great quality at a reasonable price

1.review: Great location - hidden in the forest and fields, close to the sea. Property is intriguing and has got some nice surprises
1.name: Marek from Poznań

2.review: I stayed in Dziewanna for the second time and will probably return. It’s the perfect place to reset from civilization. Everything you need is on site, children will not be bored either (there is a pool). An atmospheric place.
2.name: Kasia from Sopot

4.review: A very atmospheric place, great area for walks. Close to the city and the sea. Rooms are spotless and well kept, and the owners are the best in the world!
4.name: Łukasz from Poznań

3.review: Beautiful location, quiet, peaceful, close to many beautiful hiking trails
3.name: Ania from Bydgoszcz

5.review: A house with soul with a beautiful garden, a pool and running goats. In the area forests full of mushrooms, close to charming beaches. Wonderful hosts with passion.
5.name: Wojtek from Zakopane

10.review: Accommodation has a quiet location, hosts very friendly and helpful, delicious breakfast, communication was also possible in German
10.name: Monika from Hamburg

7.review: Wonderful place in the middle of the forest. Fantastic, helpful, nice owner, good breakfasts, great atmosphere. Reasonable distance to the concert valley of Charlotta and Słowiński National Park. Highly recommend.
7.name: Agnieszka from Olsztyn

11.review: Super quiet area, surrounded by forests. A place for people escaping from the city hustle and bustle. Rooms are big, spacious, clean. I recommend.
11.name: Jan from Zielona Góra

9.review: A place for lovers of silence and peace. Very nice hosts, breakfast delicious prepared from local products. Highly recommend.
9.name: Sylwia from Toruń

6.review: Clean, quiet, close to nature, peaceful, atmospheric and relaxing. Magic!
6.name: Justyna from Rzeszów

8.review: An exceptional property in the heart of the forest. Peace, beautifully landscaped surroundings, contact with nature – there are even goats. If someone does not like long walks in the forest, they can calmly relax on site in the garden, with a book in hand or grilling. Rooms in a fantastically revitalized farm building with a huge lounge for shared meals or meetings. By the way, it has been a long time since I had such a wonderful homemade breakfast. Dziewanna can host both peace-seeking loners and large groups. Overall, you don't get the 'hotel impression' but rather a homey atmosphere, for example through the arrangement of the apartments. No matter what you write, the most important thing is the sensational hosts: kind, very friendly, always at your disposal, simply normal. Highly recommended.
8.name: Grzegorz from Kraków

12.review: Very nice, atmospheric place. I spent two nights. It was very comfortable — everything that should be there was there (well-equipped kitchen). You can let small children run freely without fear. A few animals — cats, dogs and goats that create additional atmosphere and attraction. With a small child I found everything I needed. I recommend.
12.name: Tomek from Bielawa

13.review: Beautifully located agritourism near Słupsk. Wonderful, large garden with a place for a bonfire. Very nice and very helpful owners. If you are looking for a quiet, peaceful place to rest, Dziewanna is a bullseye.
13.name: Tomasz from Wolsztyn

14.review: A very atmospheric place, forest, fields, relaxation, a reset from civilization. Only the chirping of crickets around. On site all the necessary amenities.
14.name: Basia from Zielona Góra
